document.full_text: the 247 elephant tusks, some up to 6.5 feet long, were found during an x-ray scan of a shipping container labeled as frozen mackerel, customs officials said.
document.title: asia: thailand: 2 tons of tusks seized
lines_and_colors: the 247 elephant tusks, some up to 6.5 feet long, were found during an x-ray scan of a shipping container labeled as frozen mackerel, customs officials said.
